Texts.Chs: 一个灵活的存储设备，带有一个ICE-3加密锁。我不可能破解掉它，或许我可以重置它？
Texts.Eng: A slick storage rig with an ICE-3 encrypted lock.  No way I can hack this.  Maybe I can reset it?

Texts.Chs: 一个存储系统。它的功能看起来像我的一样强大。这一个不工作。
Texts.Eng: A storage device, seems to function a lot like my own. This one isn't on.

Texts.Chs: 显而易见的。一个Kirhosi存储系统。它不工作。
Texts.Eng: Stating the obvious. A Kirhosi storage system. It is not on.
